articles.content:
(CNN) -- If you think a negative test result means you don't have coronavirus, you could be wrong.
It can take days before a new infection shows up on a Covid-19 test.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: More women than men struggle to fall asleep in both Europe and the US, study finds - CNN
articles.description: More women than men suffer from insomnia in the United States, the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, according to a new study of over a million people. So do smokers and people who are overweight. Here's how to get some zzzs.
